channel.title: Suggest a Server Please =)
channel.description:
Hi, I'm wanting a server that has working moderator actions(mute, ban,etc) and reporting(that goes to reported section or something).
I really just want a noob friendly server but with all the working moderator features, etc.
Please help =D I will give whoever helps me the most a cookie o:

item.title: Suggest a Server Please =)
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Can you give me a link? And does it come with the client to?
I’m fairly new, and I don’t really know any coding =/

So a link to a server with source and client would be great!
hands you half a cookie theres more where that came from

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest a Server Please =)

item.description:
@bhill wrote:

I’d say start with a Deltascape source.
